title: Important Notes
content: This is a digital download, and no physical item will be shipped. Please note that colors may vary based on your screen and printing method. This product is for personal use only; commercial use or redistribution is prohibited. If you need a different size or have a special request, feel free to message me—I'm always happy to assist!
instructions: This is the base text for the 'Important Notes' section for the 3x4 aspect ratio. Edit the text to refine the message for this paragraph.
